caller_intent: The caller wants to finalize insurance payments for a truck, clarify requirements for North Carolina filings, and ensure an unrelated accident involving their mother does not affect their policy.
resolution_steps: Agent confirmed the quoted premium ($34.49 with $17.50/month auto pay) and addressed confusion about North Carolina filings.
Discussed accident details (caller's mother's accident on 11/28/23) to ensure it's marked as 'not at fault' and not linked to the caller's policy.
Set up auto pay with provided banking details (credit card and routing/account numbers).
Confirmed electronic proof of insurance and mailing preferences.
knowledge_required: Auto pay setup and banking information collection
Accident reporting procedures (at-fault vs. not at fault)
Handling unrelated accidents on separate policies
systems_referenced: Insurance portal for policy details and payments
Banking systems for routing/account number verification
summary: Agent helped client finalize truck insurance payments, clarified North Carolina filing requirements, and ensured a separate accident involving the client's mother would not impact their policy. Auto pay was set up with banking details provided, and electronic proof of insurance was confirmed.
